content: furly hat 2026 by petra breakstone furly hat or beanie… the feel here is extremely comfortable and oh so soft just like fur - only with a faux fur yarn used so no pain is involved fold the brim up or leave it down for a different look knitted in the round from the bottom up the pattern is entirely written for a medium size 21 5 around 9 in height fitting most getting started co 48 sts pl m and join in the round being careful yarn not to twist stitches and knit 20 rounds 1 faux fur skein 55 yards/100 grams in a super bulky weight washable poly decrease knit kits/yarn at round 1 k4 k2tog repeat to end 40 sts https //yarnz2go myshopify com round 2 and all even rounds knit round 3 k3 k2tog repeat to end 32 sts notions needed round 5 k1 k2tog repeat to last st k1 22 sts us size 10 5 6 5 mm circular needle 16 round 7 k1 k2tog repeat to last st k1 15 sts 42 cm in length round 9 k1 k2tog repeat to end 10 sts one stitch marker round 10 knit tapestry needle for finishing cut yarn to about 10 in length gauge 8 sts and 14 row in 4 stockinette stitch finishing the crown load the tapestry needle with the yarn tail and pick abbreviations up all remaining sts from knitting needle co - cast on cinch sts together tightly and bring needle through k - knit top opening to under/inside of hat and secure k2tog - knit 2 stitches together weave in ends do not block as the furry yarn looks pl m - place marker best unblocked repeat - repeat pl m - place marker enjoy your cozy hat sts - stitches web yarnz2go myshopify com/ email yarnz2go@gmail com ravelry petrabreakstone © petra breakstone enjoy the knit page 1 of 1
